NewsArticle.Title: Chat on Planet Dark Ages!
NewsArticle.Content:
Planet Dark Ages will be hosting a developer chat Tuesday afternoon. More details are below. We hope to see you there!
Server: irc.xenobyte.net Room: #planetda Time: 4:00 PM Pacific, 5:00 PM Mountain, 6:00 PM Central, 7:00 Eastern Date: Tuesday 11/26/02
